TypeClass.description: The class of the type e.g Concession, Hire

TypeCode.description: The canonical code of the type e.g Sale

TypeDesc.description: The description of the type e.g Sale Order Line

SubTypeCode.description: The canonical code of the sub type e.g Sale

SubTypeDesc.description: The description of the sub type e.g Sale Order Line

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
